oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis and carbonylation of aryl acetylenes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
TAFESH, A
DAVENPORT, K
ORTIZ, P
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: convenient synthesis
acid
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Several substituted aryl acetylenes have been prepared from acetophenones using the Vilsmeier reaction. Carbonylation of aryl acetylenes to produce aryl acrylic acids has been studied as a potential route to optically pure anti-inflammatory drugs such as ibuprofen and naproxen.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY, 40(12), 1166-1169
